name: Miner Vitalya
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #48

You're a regular ol' worker Vitalya from Tver, Russia on your average shift, digging gold and digging monsters. Descend down an endless cave with one of your trusty drills that you only know how to use while jumping!

Arrow keys to move, Z or C to jump, X to rev up your drill

  • Mini-update 4/27/2021:
    • Swapped the buttons used for jumping and drilling to optimize for mobile player. A mirrored layout is still available one key over.
    • Fixed sound delay when taking damage from an enemy

SPECIAL THANKS:
